# How to Download and Install Dmxzone Extension Manager for Dreamweaver
 
Dmxzone Extension Manager is a powerful tool that allows you to easily install and manage extensions for Dreamweaver, the popular web design software. With Dmxzone Extension Manager, you can browse, download, and update hundreds of extensions from Dmxzone.com, the largest online community for web developers and designers. In this article, we will show you how to download and install Dmxzone Extension Manager for Dreamweaver, as well as how to crack it to unlock its full potential.

## Step 1: Download Dmxzone Extension Manager for Dreamweaver
 
The first step is to download Dmxzone Extension Manager for Dreamweaver from the official website. You can choose between the Windows or Mac version, depending on your operating system. The download file is about 40 MB in size and will take a few minutes to complete.

## Step 2: Install Dmxzone Extension Manager for Dreamweaver
 
Once you have downloaded the file, you need to install it on your computer. To do so, follow these steps:
 
- Double-click on the downloaded file to launch the installer.
- Follow the instructions on the screen to complete the installation process.
- Restart Dreamweaver if it was running during the installation.
- Launch Dmxzone Extension Manager from your desktop or start menu.

You should see a window like this:
 ![Dmxzone Extension Manager window](dmxzone-extension-manager-window.jpg) 
## Step 3: Crack Dmxzone Extension Manager for Dreamweaver
 
Dmxzone Extension Manager for Dreamweaver is a free tool that allows you to install and manage up to five extensions at a time. However, if you want to access more extensions or use advanced features such as backup and restore, you need to purchase a license key from Dmxzone.com. The license key costs $39 per year and can be used on up to three computers.
 
If you don't want to pay for the license key, you can crack Dmxzone Extension Manager for Dreamweaver using a simple trick. Here's how:

- Open Dmxzone Extension Manager and go to the Settings tab.
- Click on the License button and enter any email address and password.
- Click on Activate and wait for a few seconds.
- You should see a message saying "Your license has been activated successfully".
- Close Dmxzone Extension Manager and reopen it.

You should now be able to install and manage unlimited extensions from Dmxzone.com without any restrictions.
